overview: It’s simple math: we can burn less than 565 more gigatons of carbon dioxide and stay below 2°C of warming — anything more than that risks catastrophe for life on earth. The only problem? Fossil fuel corporations now have 2,795 gigatons in their reserves, five times the safe amount. And they’re planning to burn it all — unless we rise up to stop them.
tagline: The Rising Movement to Change the Terrifying Math of the Climate Crisis and Fight the Fossil Fuel Industry.
title: Do the Math
